pages.text: Expertises are $(l)passive$() skills that $(l)don't$() require any mana.$(br2)Expertises can be $(l)learned$() or $(l)upgraded$() by spending $(l)Expertise Points$() on it, which is gained every 5 levels upon $(l)leveling up$().$(br2)Each Expertise has various $(l)attributes$() that $(l)scale$() per level of the Expertise.

pages.title: Neuralizers
pages.text: Expertises are costly to $(l)unlearn$().$(br2)Right-clicking with a Neuralizer consumes it and $(l)resets all$() Expertises at once.
